edited_stories.edited_story_text: A placid shade falls across the peaceful lake as the sun sets. Snow blankets the trees that populate a park seemly frozen in time with the chill of nature.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: We went up to the mountains yesterday.  We saw snow covered peaks and lakes in deep valleys.  A fog rolled in later in the day spoiling the beautiful view of the countryside.
